channel.title: [Tut] How to make an EASY .jar .zip .tar .gz etc
channel.description:
To make an [b]EASY[/b] .jar .zip .tar .gz or an .tar.gz file you need winace [url=http://62.75.246.102/files/wace265i.exe]http://62.75.246.102/files/wace265i.exe[/url]
Then rigth click on the file you wanna change There should be an "add to..."button, [IMG]http://www.uploadhut.com/upload/183577.bmp??[/img] click that then in the lower rigth corner there is a buttom where it stand "current ace" rigth clik on it select you file type, click the ADD button [IMG]http://www.uploadhut.com/upload/183581.bmp??[/img]
[b]ConGratz, you got a <filetype> File[/b] ;)
~Yezus

item.title: [Tut] How to make an EASY .jar .zip .tar .gz etc
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:20318”]actually, jars are java archives… and they use the same algorithm as zips for compression, which is optional too.[/quote]Even if you don’t use compression on the jar though, it stores the files using the zip file format I believe.

Read full topic

item.title: [Tut] How to make an EASY .jar .zip .tar .gz etc
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:4, topic:20256”]What the hell?

You can just rename .zip to .jar and they work the same? That doesn’t make a ‘lick’, as mopar would say’ of sense.[/quote]

Wtf Pwnd? You didn’t know you could rename a zip to jar, and have a working jar? …

item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo

for the ‘.zip .tar .gz or an .tar.gz’ just use WinRAR
for the ‘.jar’ just rename a *.zip file to *.jar

;D

item.title: [Tut] How to make an EASY .jar .zip .tar .gz etc

item.description:
@yezus wrote:

To make an EASY .jar .zip .tar .gz or an .tar.gz file you need winace http://62.75.246.102/files/wace265i.exe

Then rigth click on the file you wanna change There should be an "add to…"button,

click that then in the lower rigth corner there is a buttom where it stand “current ace” rigth clik on it
select you file type, click the ADD button

ConGratz, you got a File

~Yezus
